[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp_ojkualv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA fuzzing run against the Mongoose TCP/IP stack uncovered a heap-buffer-overflow in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP packet handler. AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read beyond a heap [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer when `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` processes a malformed input, indicating that bounds checks [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdo not prevent out-of-range memory access.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  During fuzz testing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, arbitrary input [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis malloc’d into a buffer of size [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes and passed into the TCP/IP receive path [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if *ifp, pkt *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.c` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a read operation attempts to access [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone byte past the end of this buffer. AddressSanitizer classifies this as a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap-based buffer overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mout-of-bounds read[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The fuzzer harness allocates a buffer equal to the input length [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe failing case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but does not guard against reads at offset == length.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The ASan log shows the overflow occurring at `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the allocated region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Call stack highlights the chain: `rx_icmp` → `mg_tcpip_rx` → [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Shadow byte annotation confirms a one-byte boundary violation.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas for investigation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if *ifp, pkt *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in `net_builtin.c` around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m—focus [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mon header field parsing and index calculations.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msame source file, around line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m where packet dispatch [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Fuzzing harness in `src/mongoose/test/fuzz.c`, especially the allocation of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->p` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m95[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the invocation of `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Definitions of the `pkt` structure and any length or boundary fields it [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontains.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA thorough review of these components will provide a holistic understanding of how [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket length is tracked and where bounds enforcement is missing.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m648[0m[39m:  size_t min = avail > MG_MAX_RECV_SIZE ? MG_MAX_RECV_SIZE : avail;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m649[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf *io = &c->recv;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m650[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->size - io->len < min && ![0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + min[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m651[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"oom"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m652[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m653[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Decrypt data directly into c->recv[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m654[0m[39m:    long n = [0m[1;35mmg_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, &io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, io->size - io->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m655[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == MG_IO_ERR[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m656[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"TLS recv error"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m657[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m658[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Decrypted successfully - trigger MG_EV_READ[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m659[0m[39m:      io->len += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m660[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MG_EV_READ, &n[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m661[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m else n < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m: outstanding data to be moved to c->recv[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m662[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m663[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m664[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m665[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mread_conn[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_connection *c, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m666[0m[39m:  struct connstate *s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct connstate *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m667[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf *io = c->is_tls ? &c->rtls : &c->recv;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m668[0m[39m:  uint32_t seq = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m669[0m[39m:  uint32_t rem_ip;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m670[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&rem_ip, c->rem.ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m671[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->flags & TH_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m672[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we initiated the closure, we reply with ACK upon receiving FIN[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m673[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we didn't initiate it, we reply with FIN as part of the normal TCP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m674[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m closure process[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m675[0m[39m:    uint8_t flags = TH_ACK;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m676[0m[39m:    s->ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m677[0m[39m:    s->fin_rcvd = true;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m678[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_draining && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m679[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq == [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Simultaneous closure ?[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m680[0m[39m:        s->seq++;                               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Yes. Increment our SEQ[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m681[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Otherwise,[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m682[0m[39m:        s->seq = [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set to peer's ACK[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m683[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m684[0m[39m:      s->twclosure = true;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m685[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m686[0m[39m:      flags |= TH_FIN;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m687[0m[39m:      c->is_draining = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m688[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m689[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m690[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, flags, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m691[0m[39m:           [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m""[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m692[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m this is an ACK[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m693[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->fin_rcvd && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m s->twclosure = true;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m694[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mseq != s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m695[0m[39m:    uint32_t ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m696[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack == ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m697[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ignoring duplicate pkt"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m698[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m699[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"SEQ != ACK: %x %x %x"[0m[39m, seq, s->ack, ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m700[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, TH_ACK, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:500[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m580[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m500[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m501[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m No UDP listener on this port. Should send ICMP, but keep silent.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m502[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m503[0m[39m:    c->rem.port = pkt->udp->sport;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m504[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->rem.ip, &pkt->ip->src, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m505[0m[39m:    struct connstate *s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct connstate *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m506[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->mac, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->mac[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m507[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->recv.len >= MG_MAX_RECV_SIZE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m508[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"max_recv_buf_size reached"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m509[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->recv.size - c->recv.len < pkt->pay.len &&[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m510[0m[39m:               ![0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&c->recv, c->recv.len + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m511[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"oom"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m512[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m513[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&c->recv.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mc->recv.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m514[0m[39m:      c->recv.len += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m515[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MG_EV_READ, &pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m518[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m520[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, uint8_t *dst_mac, uint32_t [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdst_ip,[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m523[0m[39m:#if [0m[1;36m0[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m524[0m[39m:  uint8_t opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xb4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m MSS = [0m[1;36m1460[0m[39m, SACK permitted[0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m526[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handshake? Set MSS[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m531[0m[39m:  struct ip *ip =[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m532[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, dst_mac, [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, ifp->ip, dst_ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m533[0m[39m:  struct tcp *tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m534[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtcp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m535[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf != NULL && len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmemmove[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m536[0m[39m:  tcp->sport = sport;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m537[0m[39m:  tcp->dport = dport;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:350[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m357[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m350[0m[39m:    *arp = *pkt->arp;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m351[0m[39m:    arp->op = [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m352[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39marp->tha, pkt->arp->sha, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->arp->tha[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m353[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39marp->sha, ifp->mac, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->arp->sha[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m354[0m[39m:    arp->tpa = pkt->arp->spa;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m355[0m[39m:    arp->spa = ifp->ip;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m356[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ARP: tell %M we're %M"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &arp->tpa, mg_print_mac,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m357[0m[39m:              &ifp->mac[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m389[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of Root Cause  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The heap-buffer-overflow arises because `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` computes the ICMP header [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m based solely on the IHL field in the IPv4 header, without [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidating the IHL value or re-checking that the full ICMP header actually resides [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin the packet buffer. Subsequently, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` reads `pkt->icmp->type` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munconditionally, triggering a one-byte out-of-bounds access when IHL is malformed [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor too small.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Core Fix Approach  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. **Validate the IPv4 IHL and header size** immediately upon entry to the IP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreceive path. Reject [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdrop[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m packets whose IHL field is < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or whose computed header[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength exceeds the raw buffer length.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. **Ensure the entire ICMP header fits** in the packet buffer before computing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` or dispatching to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Optionally, **add a defensive bounds check** at the beginning of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto guard against future misuse from other callers.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Patch Strategy  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate the start of the IPv4 packet handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~[0m[1;36m580[0m[39m, where `pkt->ip` is valid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Modify as follows:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Compute and validate IHL:  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      uint8_t ihl = pkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      size_t ip_hdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IHL must be at least [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and not exceed available data[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m || [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hdr_len > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Invalid IP header length %u"[0m[39m, ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m drop malformed packet[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Compute the ICMP header pointer and check full header fits:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m bytes are within the raw buffer[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP header truncated"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m not enough data for ICMP header[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Leave the existing dispatch to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` unchanged; the above checks [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguarantee safe access to `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional defense-in-depth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m At the top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, insert a similar [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard:  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char *icmp_end = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_end > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Normal, well-formed ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL ≥ [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, full ICMP header present[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pass [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthrough unchanged.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocol code paths are unaffected; only malformed or truncated [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP/ICMP packets are dropped early.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to external dependencies, harness code, or test code. Existing unit[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtests for valid packets remain valid.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification & Side Effects  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Optimality**: This strategy directly addresses the insufficient bounds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks leading to the overflow, following best practices for IP header parsing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdrop malformed headers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal Impact**: Only the IP/ICMP receive path is hardened; other features [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mARP, UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain untouched.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: By validating IHL and header boundaries, we eliminate the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msingle-byte read overflow without introducing broad exception-catching or disabling[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctionality.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Tests & Fuzzing**: Fuzz tests that previously triggered the overflow will [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnow safely return from `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without crashing, satisfying the fuzzer harness [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrequirements.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References in Codebase  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The existing [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbut flawed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m check in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` that compared [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` against `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is retained but [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmade safe by first validating IHL.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar IP parsing logic elsewhere [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., TCP or UDP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already assumes sane IHL[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalues; this patch brings ICMP in line with those expectations.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo additional files need to be retrieved. This targeted set of checks fully [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddresses the heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/31/25 12:08:55][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=677119;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=56454;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/31/25 12:13:26][0m[2;36m [0m[1;31mERROR   [0m PoV found:                                                                           ]8;id=727874;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=890221;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py#102\[2m102[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                 [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                    [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         vm.mmap_rnd_bits = [1;36m28[0m                                                                [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m -[33mrss_limit_mb[0m=[1;36m2560[0m -[33mtimeout[0m=[1;36m25[0m -[33mruns[0m=[1;36m100[0m [35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m -[33mtimeout_exitcode[0m=[1;36m0[0m [1m<[0m[39m [0m  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Seed: [0m[1;36m3692397699[0m                                                               [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mShadow byte legend [0m[1;39m([0m[39mone shadow byte represents [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m application bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp_ojkualv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer during [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzing in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a single-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread past the end of an allocated buffer occurs. The developer’s patch attempt [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroduced a defensive check before accessing the ICMP header:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Compute `icmp_start` and `icmp_end` pointers around `pkt->icmp`.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • If the raw buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf` plus its length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m does not fully cover the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header, log “ICMP header truncated” and return early.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying this patch, the same ASan heap-buffer-overflow persists at the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical code location, indicating that the bounds check did not prevent the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds read.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer runs `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which invokes `mg_tcpip_rx`, and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthen `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m` through `[0m[1;36m0x504000000171[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, at source line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The problematic access is `pkt->icmp->type`, executed without verifying that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe raw packet buffer actually contains a complete ICMP header.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The backtrace shows the allocation happening in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the fuzzer supplies a truncated packet.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Important Observations  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow location is immediately after the allocated region, suggesting [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the code assumes `pkt->raw.len` is large enough to cover the ICMP header but [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer inputs violate this assumption.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash reproducibly occurs in `rx_icmp`, not deeper in the IP or TCP [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other sanitizers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., UBSan or MSan[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are reporting issues, focusing [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattention on buffer bounds.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch adds before any ICMP field dereference:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Defensive bounds check: ensure ICMP header fits in raw buffer *[0m[35m/[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+         char *icmp_start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+         char *icmp_end   = icmp_start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len < icmp_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+           [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP header truncated"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+           return;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m existing logic follows[0m[33m...[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This aims to verify that the contiguous raw packet buffer is large enough to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontain a full `struct icmp`.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, ASan reports the exact same [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same source line [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The log confirms that the new bounds check did not intercept the invalid read,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmeaning `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len < icmp_end` evaluated false for the failing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtest case, allowing the out-of-bounds access to proceed.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The way `pkt->icmp` is computed or aligned relative to `pkt->raw.buf` and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len`: ensure the pointer arithmetic matches the actual buffer layout.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The values of `pkt->raw.buf`, `pkt->raw.len`, and the offset to `pkt->icmp` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor corrupted or truncated inputs.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Upstream code in `mg_tcpip_rx` and packet parsing routines that set up [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw` and `pkt->icmp`, to verify consistency of length fields and header [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointers.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other protocol handlers following the `ETH/IP/ICMP` parsing that might [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malso assume full headers without bounds checks.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo speculative root causes or fixes are proposed here—this report is limited to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdescribing the failure, the attempted mitigation, and where to look next for a [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomprehensive resolution.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x55dcb69edc02[0m[39m bp [0m[1;36m0x7ffc2868d3e0[0m[39m sp [0m[1;36m0x7ffc2868d3d8[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m                                              [2m                [0m
