[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.h:[0m[1;36m93[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m93[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m153[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m389[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:804[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:380[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m384[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m380[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:886[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:801[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Relocate and strengthen the ICMP‐header bounds check so it precedes any [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` access in `rx_icmp`:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. At the very top of `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, compute the pointer to the ICMP header [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and verify that the raw buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m covers the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull header:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Determine the ICMP header region in terms of raw buffer:  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        icmp_start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        icmp_end = icmp_start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Guard: if `pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len < icmp_end`, log “ICMP header [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated” and return immediately.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Only after this check, proceed to read `pkt->icmp->type` in the `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcondition. This prevents the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte OOB read on truncated packets.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Correct the ICMP‐pointer and payload calculations in the IPv4 dispatch [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`, handling `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Compute the actual IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39min bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from the low nibble of [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip->ver`:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Before setting `pkt->icmp`, verify the buffer is large enough for the ICMP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Set the ICMP pointer relative to the true end of the IP header:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Compute the payload region starting immediately after the ICMP header:[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. Call `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` as before.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Remove the erroneous “deferred” bounds check added in the last patch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurred after reading `pkt->icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and replace it with the correct one at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe top of `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preserve existing reply‐logic in `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcomputing `hlen`, `space`, `plen`, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand invoking `tx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m unchanged beyond the relocated bounds check.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Moving the header‐size guard above the first dereference of `pkt->icmp->type` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meliminates the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte heap‐buffer‐overflow.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Calculating `pkt->icmp` based on the actual IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ensures that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP header pointer aligns with packets containing IP options, preventing [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload‐length underflow/overflow scenarios.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The check on `pkt->raw.len` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrather than `pkt->pay.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m guarantees that we only [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccess memory within the original buffer allocation.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing functionality—echo‐reply generation for ICMP type [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m—is preserved.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No modifications are made to fuzzing harnesses, test code, or external utilities.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPotential Side Effects & Mitigation:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Valid IPv4 packets with IP options are now correctly parsed [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprevious code [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mignored options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; this should be backwards‐compatible with most environments but [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay change the payload offset slightly. Tests exercising IP options should be [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdated if they relied on the old behavior.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Logging on truncated headers is unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39muses `MG_DEBUG`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so verbose/debug [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuilds will still report the same message.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar logic should be applied for ICMPv6 if needed, but this patch focuses on [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 ICMP.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReferences:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The IP‐payload parsing logic at lines [0m[1;36m887[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m894[0m[39m already computes payload start [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39musing the IHL; our change aligns the ICMP parser to the same calculation.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The original overflow was at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, where `pkt->icmp->type` was [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccessed unguarded. The new guard ensures safe reads. [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/31/25 12:13:42][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=522012;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=341310;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp_ojkualv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-reported heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggered by a malformed packet [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput under the libFuzzer harness. The overflow occurs when reading one byte past [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of an allocated ICMP header region.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt adds a defensive bounds check at the start of `rx_icmp` to verify[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat the ICMP header lies fully within the raw packet buffer, and adjusts the code [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath in the IP-processing branch of `mg_tcpip_rx` to compute the IP header length [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`ihl`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, check that the raw buffer is sufficiently large for eth+IP+ICMP headers, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mset `pkt->icmp` accordingly, and then call `rx_icmp`.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the fuzzing run still reproduces the same [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same location in `rx_icmp`. The sanitizer log and stack[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtrace are effectively unchanged, indicating the added checks did not prevent the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds access.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer report:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • ERROR: heap-buffer-overflow at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at that address inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The offending access is `pkt->icmp->type` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The read pointer lies exactly one byte past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. rx_icmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. mg_tcpip_rx [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtest/fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. FuzzerDriver and main  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m380[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a new block was inserted:  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *icmp_start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char *icmp_end   = icmp_start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len < icmp_end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP header truncated"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     This aims to bail out if the ICMP header would extend past the raw buffer end.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IP-processing branch of `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround original lines [0m[1;36m799[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m802[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe code was modified to:  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t ihl = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     This replaces the prior unchecked cast `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and length check on [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len`.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After recompiling and running the fuzzer with `-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`, the sanitizer log [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill reports a heap-buffer-overflow at the same line [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, with [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical shadow-memory diagnostics. The patch has not averted the crash.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Further Investigation Areas  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The definition and initialization of `pkt->raw.buf` and `pkt->raw.len` to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirm they reflect the entire received buffer size.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The computation of the IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ihl`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and whether it can under- or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverestimate the actual header boundary in malformed inputs.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interaction between `mkpay`, `pkt->pay.len`, and how payload pointers are [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputed and later used.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sequence in `mg_tcpip_rx` — especially earlier branches that handle [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfragmentation or other protocols — to see if `pkt->icmp` can be set inconsistently.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any assumptions in `rx_icmp` beyond the header bounds check [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., reading [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother fields in `struct icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzz harness code in `test/fuzz.c` to understand how packet buffers are [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated and whether additional context [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., link-layer padding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is expected.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp_ojkualv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue was a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The fuzzer log shows a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the end of an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region for the packet buffer. A patch was [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempted to add explicit bounds checks around the ICMP header and to recalculate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader sizes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mEthernet, IP, ICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m using the IPv4 header length field [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ver & [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x0F[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Despite these changes, the same heap-buffer-overflow is reproduced at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame source line after applying the patch.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - When running `fuzz` under libFuzzer and AddressSanitizer, `rx_icmp` attempts [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto read `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash report indicates:  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • a READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at an address immediately beyond a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • the allocation happens in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` via `malloc`, passing the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw input as packet buffer.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • the overflow occurs at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m of `net_builtin.c` inside `rx_icmp`.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m holds fewer bytes than expected by the code path [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat indexes into the ICMP header.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Important observations  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The vulnerable offset is computed without validating the IP header length or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual buffer length.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The raw buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used later for payload copy but not [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the initial `icmp->type` read.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash always happens on byte-level read of the `type` field, one past the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The same region [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x172[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m appears in both initial and patched runs, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating unchanged logic for header location.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A new block was added at the top of `rx_icmp` to compute `type_ptr = [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&pkt->icmp->type` and return if it lies outside `pkt->raw.buf`..`pkt->raw.buf + [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ICMP check was inverted to early-return if not an echo request or wrong [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdestination.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv4 header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ihl`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is extracted from `pkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m`.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Header size is recomputed as `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ihl + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Payload length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`plen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and available space in the transmit buffer are [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrecalculated using offsets in the raw buffer.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar header-length validation and pointer setup was added in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore calling `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Log after patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer was rerun under the same conditions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m` interactive mode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer still reports a heap-buffer-overflow at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash stack and memory region details are identical to the initial report.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No change in the offset or affected region: the same one-byte read overflow [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Construction and initialization of `pkt->raw.buf` and `pkt->raw.len` in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket setup/harness.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Assignment to `pkt->icmp` in `mg_tcpip_rx` and whether it respects the raw [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer bounds.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic in `mkpay` that adjusts `pkt->pay.buf/len` and how that interacts [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith header pointers.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Path through `rx_ip` and related functions that may overwrite or miscompute [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip->ver` or `pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Consistency of `pkt->raw.len` with actual allocated size when the fuzzer feeds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marbitrary data.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other code paths that reference ICMP fields without bounds validation [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., fragmented packets, UDP path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      pkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m &&[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      pkt->ip != NULL &&[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+      pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-799[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m802[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m13[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp_ojkualv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow is triggered in the function `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen the fuzzer feeds a malformed packet. The overflow occurs on a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP type field just past the end of the allocated packet buffer. A patch [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt added explicit bounds checks around the ICMP header and recalculated header[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand payload offsets, but after reapplying the patch the same overflow recurs at the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Further investigation is required in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket‐parsing logic, particularly around buffer length tracking and pointer [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic for IPv4 and ICMP headers.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- While fuzzing the Mongoose network code, a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read of `pkt->icmp->type` in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` goes out of bounds.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The offending address is exactly one byte past the end of an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash stack traces to `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The raw buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is smaller than the assumed offset for the ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader, so accessing the `type` field reads into the ASan redzone.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A block was added before reading `pkt->icmp->type` to verify that the type field [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlives inside `pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic for handling ICMP echo [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was refactored to return early when [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconditions fail.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- IPv4 header length is now computed from the IHL field [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, with a check against the minimum `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The code for mapping packet payload [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and reply construction [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tx_ip` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ `memcpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was rewritten to use computed offsets instead of fixed structure sizes.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar IHL and bounds checks were added in the higher‐level packet dispatch [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mproto [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m and proto [0m[1;36m17[0m[39m cases[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and at the initial IP header parsing.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult of Patch  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ASan still reports an [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical heap-buffer-overflow at `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The invalid access remains a read of `pkt->icmp->type` one byte past the buffer. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash location, buffer address, and allocation site are unchanged, indicating[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe early bounds-check did not guard the problematic code path.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. pkt->raw buffer management  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How `pkt->raw.buf` and `pkt->raw.len` are initialized and updated in [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` before calling `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the `raw.len` field always reflects the true length of the underlying [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer throughout parsing.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. ICMP header pointer calculation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The expression `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m&pkt->icmp->type` vs. how `pkt->icmp` is assigned [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbased on `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` or computed IHL offset.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Possible code paths where `pkt->icmp` is set without verifying the buffer has [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspace for the full ICMP header.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Header length determination  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Interpretation of `pkt->ip->ver` field: upper [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits are version, lower [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare IHL.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensuring the code masks and shifts correctly to obtain IHL, and that this [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalue is within the valid range [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≤ [0m[1;36m15[0m[39m, ≥ IPv4 minimum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Packet dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sequence that handles `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m vs. other protocols.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Interaction between `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload pointer setup[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and subsequent calls to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Bound checks placement  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The initial bounds check for the `type` field may occur too late or under a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode path that is not always taken.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that no direct references to `pkt->icmp` or its fields happen before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe guard.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA holistic review of the buffer layout in `struct pkt`, the raw‐buffer ownership [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmodel, and all parsing routines for IPv4 and ICMP is recommended to locate every [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchecked pointer arithmetic that may lead to OOB reads.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
